original_text: The prophets prophesy falsely, and the priests bear rule by their means; and my people love to have it so: and what will ye do in the end thereof?
korean_text: 선지자들은 거짓을 예언하며 제사장들은 자기 권력으로 다스리며 내 백성은 그것을 좋게 여기니 마지막에는 너희가 어찌하려느냐

sentences.original_text: and the priests bear rule by their means
and my people love to have it so
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성이 그렇게 되는 것을 좋아하니

sentences.original_text: and what will ye do in the end thereof?
